content: materials to make one heel stitch hand towel you will need… - 3 skeins of purl soho s serif 1 100% pima cotton each skein is approximately 164 yards/ 100 grams approximately 492 total yards required we used the colors heirloom white warm rock gray birch alabaster cream yellow haystack blue overalls yellow ochre and summer melon - us 5 3 75 mm straight or 24-inch circular needles 2 - if using straight needles two us 3 double pointed needles 3 for i-cord gauge 24 stitches and 38 row = 4 inches in stitch pattern size finished dimensions approximately 17 inches wide x 28 inches long designed for purl soho by purl soho designer hiromi glover 4 based on our heel stitch hand towel originally designed by jake canton 5 click here 6 to see even more of hiromi s work 1 https //www purlsoho com/serif html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23796_23802 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23799 4 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/hiromi-glover-for-purl-soho/ 5 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/jake-canton-for-purl-soho/ 6 https //www instagram com/mignonnegrise/
